issue.title: [Java] Force delete jni lib on JVM exit
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17794](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17794). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use `FileUtils.forceDeleteOnExit` to delete jni lib file on JVM exit. `FileUtils.forceDeleteOnExit` actually add a shut down hook to make sure file delte.
